alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rankin County through 615 PM CDT... At 533 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ludlow to Flowood. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Flowood around 540 PM CDT. Brandon around 555 PM CDT. Pearl around 600 PM CDT. Pisgah around 610 PM CDT. Richland, Florence and Monterey around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Puckett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
